title: How Le Corbusier changed the world
text:
MORE... 
A pioneer of modern architecture, Le Corbusier (born Charles-Ã‰douard Jeanneret-Gris) died 50 years ago today. Despite his profound influence, he remains relatively unknown outside of architectural circles. Here we shed a little light on his most notable works and how his ideas changed the world we live in...
